Title: Pokémon: Mewtwo Returns
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Drama, Family, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Actors: Veronica Taylor, Rachael Lillis, Eric Stuart, Madeleine Blaustein
Plot: Team Rocket's memories of Mewtwo had been erased, but the Team Rocket scientists' logs have not. After uncovering the logs, they track down Mewtwo and build a Base in a Johto. Ash and company meet Mr. Giovanni for the first time.
